title: 25: OBITCH welcome to the jungle..
description:
You know what time it is! This week we get into some animalistic tendencies. From grieving rituals, to burials, pets-they’re just like us! We’ve got  obituaries for some good boys…grab your tissues, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.(say it with us) criminalssssss!
Follow us: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sources: 
https://www.smithsonianmag.com/science-nature/do-animals-experience-grief-180970124/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animal_grief https://www.bbcearth.com/news/the-truth-about-animal-grief https://www.foxnews.com/lifestyle/dog-obituary-melt-hearts-twitter-best-boy https://www.nationalgeographic.com/animals/article/elephants-mourning-video-animal-grief https://www.petciel.com/blog/oldest-pet-cemetery https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/notes-from-the-field-the-cemetery-of-the-dogs https://theculturetrip.com/europe/france/paris/articles/le-cimetiere-des-chiens-what-to-know-about-pariss-unique-pet-cemetery/ https://www.messynessychic.com/2019/08/15/and-now-in-overlooked-urban-adventures-the-pet-cemetery/ https://www.israel21c.org/the-curious-incident-of-ancient-dogs-buried-in-mysterious-graves/ https://pages.vassar.edu/realarchaeology/2017/09/17/baikal-dogs/ https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/oldest-pet-cemetery-berenice-egypt https://www.science.org/content/article/graves-nearly-600-cats-and-dogs-ancient-egypt-may-be-world-s-oldest-pet-cemetery https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/world/world-s-oldest-pet-cemetery-found-at-2-000-year-old-egyptian-port/ar-BB1e80zw https://www.hartsdalepetcrematory.com/about-us/our-history/ https://theculturetrip.com/europe/france/paris/articles/le-cimetiere-des-chiens-what-to-know-about-pariss-unique-pet-cemetery/ https://bonjourparis.com/history/cimetiere-des-chiens-the-worlds-oldest-pet-cemetery/ https://www.hartsdalepetcrematory.com/about-us/our-history/ https://hauntedmansion.fandom.com/wiki/Pet_Cemetery https://nbc-2.com/news/2021/10/19/florida-man-arrested-for-trying-to-rob-waffle-house-with-finger-guns/ https://people.com/pets/touching-dog-obit/ https://www.huffpost.com/entry/obit-witch-is-dead-_n_5671640
